accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research use. Audio-visual materials are not available in original format, and must be reformatted to a digital use copy.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: Mortimer Leventritt was a graduate of the Stanford University class of 1899, and a donor of significant additions to the Asian collection at the Stanford University Museum of Art in 1941 (now Iris & B. Gerald Cantor Center for Visual Arts at Stanford University).
